website_summaries.verdict: An economically friendly pack of four pairs of salon shoes.
pros: Uses a sock-like design that is durable and comfortable enough to be worn without the need for a harder sole
Each pack comes with a variety of colors to mix and match based on your preferences
Made of soft fabric with aloe
cons: Shoes can slip around on the foot without proper socks

customer_reviews.title: The replacements I bought are HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these exact socks a few years ago, and they were fabulous. They were comfy and lasted so long - fabulous quality. The replacements I bought are HORRIBLE!!! The non-skid letters and dots on the bottom of them immediately start to fall off the very day I wear a new pair. I bought these mostly for comfort and safety, but the non-skid stuff will be gone within a few wears. I feel ripped off. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but very linty
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I wear a US Women's size 7, and they fit perfectly and stay on. The elastic doesn't itch or bind at all, at least on me. The only problem is that lint keeps coming out of them forever, every time you take them off, and after a lot of wear and washes, they get kind of felted on the bottom and aren't as soft or fuzzy anymore. The lint doesn't stop coming until they aren't soft and fluffy anymore. I love the fuchsia and gray the best. Wish there was a pack without baby blue and especially pink, but the feel is more important than the looks.
customer_reviews.author: MsE0

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Hospital Stay
customer_reviews.text: Great socks for a hospital stay. The grips on the bottom work great. I’ve had them for over a year now and they have held up.
customer_reviews.author: Julia T

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Colors are true.
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable socks. I hate wearing fuzzy socks because they make your feet sweat. But these have not done that. I have had slightly rough feet since winter started. These socks have softened them up in only 2 days. They are nice. That strap is not bothersome either. The only issue is the rubber grippers on the bottom are peeling off already. Its only the second day and I have hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: J Webb

customer_reviews.title: They do fit a size 10W foot.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and soft. I wear a size 10 Wide shoes and these fit fine. They do shed a lot, and don't stay in place sometime. I would probable order them again tho.
customer_reviews.author: Carri Venable

customer_reviews.title: Wow I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality slipper socks. So soft and pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ice

customer_reviews.title: Slipper Socks
customer_reviews.text: They are nice summer socks, with non-slip soles, and an elastic to hold it on your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Super soft,bad materials
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, very messy looses a lot of material and leaves a mess
customer_reviews.author: april lemus

customer_reviews.title: i would wear these everyday if i could
customer_reviews.text: omg...i need more of these. comfy and great fit. i wear a usa 8. they can stretch a bit .my mom wears a usa 10 and she took some of these for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Love these comfy socks ! I wear a size 10 shoe and these fit great. I plan to buy more plus some as gifts !
customer_reviews.author: Jo Leopard

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love these and so did my mother in law.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Luv my Muc Luc Slipper socks
customer_reviews.text: These Muk Luk slipper socks are well made and I love them because of the comfort and that they have non slip soles. Wash up nice and the colors stay true. .
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: To delicate to actually be useful
customer_reviews.text: First impression was just that. OMG the shedding. Every single hand wash and hand dry reveals more fuzz and less sock.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectl
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stretchy. Probably fit up to size 10. I cut straps off , but they still stay on. Super soft.
customer_reviews.author: SF DIY

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and hasn't "shed" like some others do
customer_reviews.text: They are really soft and warm. Nice material and hasn't "shed" like some others do. They're different too.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these though one of my four pairs is too large. Can't explain that.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped my feet in luxury
customer_reviews.text: They really did, they fit true to size. Only complaint is all the fuzz they gave off for the first washing or two. Other than that no complaints here, they stay soft after washing, and have gripper bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: JayC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for my kid's teachers and loved how soft they felt so I purchased some for myself. Best gift to myself ever! I wear these daily around the house and have been known to slip a pair of boots on over them and go out on the town :)
customer_reviews.author: Michele Brodbeck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these soft lounging socks. Can't wait to get home and put them on. Exactly what I wanted and the four pack is great. Always have a pair clean to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE REED

customer_reviews.title: socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are comfortable and I can wear them all day long. they are snug and a perfect fit for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: rheanna b.

customer_reviews.title: Best Slipper Socks Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish this came in more colors! They are so comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Petsche

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors too
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my elderly mother. She LOVES them and had me order more. They stay on well, have no-skid bottom, are well made and wash and wear well. Nice colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MaryJane socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great for wearing around the house. The strap keeps them on and makes them fit great. 2nd time I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful. So soft and they stay on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: C. Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Soft socks
customer_reviews.text: A bit too big for my size 7 feet. Very soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: lac

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting them to be so soft! They are really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: hole in one
customer_reviews.text: The grey pair had a hole in them, had to return them. the elastic band seemed a little misplaced, it was too close to my ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, very thin
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, very thin, grip bottom does not grip and they are small. I should have believed previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia DeLuke

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great slipper socks. They are incredibly soft and very stretchy. I wear a women's US size 6.5 in shoes, and these socks are a little loose on my feet, although they do stay on. The tread on the bottom is not very aggressive and does not extend to the heel of the sock, so you only get gripping power at the ball of the foot. They are plush but not very densely woven, so they will not keep your feet warm if there is a cold draft around. Mine arrived as four individually packaged pairs, great for sharing. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: The Bed Won't Eat These at Night
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these and I adore them!!! For those who love to sleep in socks, but your socks always slip off during the night, these are made just for you! So soft and they stay put. I was worried the band would cut into the top of my foot, but it doesn't, don't feel them digging in anywhere. I will keep ordering them as long as they sell them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M-S.

customer_reviews.title: Muk Luk Slipper Socks - A great buy
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are exactly what I was looking for...something to wear around the house. I wear size 6-1/2 and they fit perfectly. I love them. As for the lint issue that I read some complaining about...a small amount of lint came off for the first few days and I have seen nothing since. They are holding up great. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. I bought them for my mother who uses ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. I bought them for my mother who uses a wheelchair. They stay on her feet and the gripping bottoms help so much when we are transferring her from chair to bed, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth O. Taylor Jr.

product_meta.title: Muk Luks Women's Buttercreme Maryjane with Aloe 4 Pair Pack
feature_bullets: Pack contains charcoal light blue purple and pink packs
